name: Align - Emotion Chat Starting from Battery Level
description: Align is a random matching chat application that allows users to easily experience emotional connections. Users are matched with others who have similar battery levels, and the connection is forcibly terminated when the battery levels diverge. This innovative chat application, designed with parting in mind, offers a slightly stimulating experience to your peaceful daily life. Enjoy a unique interaction with Align.
